name: mm-tooltip
description: A custom styled tooltip which accepts variable and partially styleable content.

attributes.name: tip-width
attributes.description: The desired width of the tooltip.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: The desired target for the tooltip, as a class or id ('.class-name' or '#targetId'). This is required to get mm-tooltip up-and-running.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: Instructs the tooltip to stay visible even after the user has rolled out of the target area.

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: Where the tooltip is positioned relative to it's target area, in 'compass' coordinates.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Instructs the tooltip to be displayed.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Instructs the tooltip to be hidden.

properties.name: tipWidth
properties.description: The desired width of the tooltip.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Object reference derived from the class or id ('.class-name' or '#targetId') provided as an attribute. Optionally, an object can be passed dynamically. This is required to get mm-tooltip up-and-running.

properties.name: auto
properties.description: Instructs the tooltip to stay visible even after the user has rolled out of the target area.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: Where the tooltip is positioned relative to it's target area, in 'compass' coordinates.
